languages.text: "Попытка арестовать спутника Вольного Торговца прямо на его судне... немыслимо! Надеюсь, в будущем за вами не явится сама Инквизиция, магос".

traits.locale_text: "Попытка арестовать спутника Вольного Торговца прямо на его судне... немыслимо! Надеюсь, в будущем за вами не явится сама Инквизиция, магос".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."
languages.original_text: "Попытка арестовать спутника Вольного Торговца прямо на его судне... немыслимо! Надеюсь, в будущем за вами не явится сама Инквизиция, магос".

traits.locale_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you itself in the future, Esteemed Magos."

"Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."

languages.text: “你居然打算在行商浪人的船上扣留{mf|他的|她的}同伴……这实在是太过火了！我希望审判庭不会亲自拜访你，贤者。”
languages.original_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."

traits.locale_text: “你居然打算在行商浪人的船上扣留{mf|他的|她的}同伴……这实在是太过火了！我希望审判庭不会亲自拜访你，贤者。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Arrêter un membre de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur le propre vaisseau de Sa Seigneurie... C'est tout simplement inacceptable ! J'espère que l'Inquisition ne s'en prendra pas à vous à l'avenir, magos. »
languages.original_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."

traits.locale_text: « Arrêter un membre de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur le propre vaisseau de Sa Seigneurie... C'est tout simplement inacceptable ! J'espère que l'Inquisition ne s'en prendra pas à vous à l'avenir, magos. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Intentar arrestar a un acompañante de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a bordo de su propia nave... ¡es inconcebible! Espero que la Inquisición no venga a por usted en un futuro, magos».
languages.original_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."

traits.locale_text: «Intentar arrestar a un acompañante de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a bordo de su propia nave... ¡es inconcebible! Espero que la Inquisición no venga a por usted en un futuro, magos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の仲間を、そのお膝元である船内で逮捕しようとするなど…常識はずれにもほどがあります！異端審問庁が今後あなたを追ってこないことを祈りますよ、マゴス」
languages.original_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you itself in the future, Magos."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の仲間を、そのお膝元である船内で逮捕しようとするなど…常識はずれにもほどがあります！異端審問庁が今後あなたを追ってこないことを祈りますよ、マゴス」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Der Versuch, den Gefährten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf dem Schiff {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft} zu verhaften ... ist unerhört! Ich hoffe, die Inquisition macht nicht eines Tages Jagd auf Euch, Magos."
languages.original_text: "Attempting to arrest the Rogue Trader's companion on {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s own vessel — it's beyond the pale! I hope the Inquisition does not come after you in the future, Magos."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kendi gemisinde Hür Tacir'in yoldaşını tutuklamaya çalışmak... Bu ne hadsizliktir! Umarım Engizisyon günün birinde peşinize düşmez Magos."
